metadata.title: CVE-2023-47384 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: MP4Box GPAC v2.3-DEV-rev617-g671976fcc-master was discovered to contain amemory leak in the function gf_isom_add_chapter at /isomedia/isom_write.c.This vulnerability allows attackers to cause a Denial of Service (DoS) viaa crafted MP4 file.

criterions.comment: gpac: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
